name: Happy Earth 100% Natuurlijke Deo Balm Bergamot
composition:
INGREDIENTS: Zea Mays Starch, Sodium Bicarbonate, Cocos Nucifera Oil*, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter*, Talc, Helianthus Annuus Seed Cera, Ricinus Communis Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil*, Shorea Robusta Resin, Rhus Verniciflua Peel Cera, Rhus Succedanea Fruit Cera, Limonene**, Citrus Limon Fruit Oil, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil*, Citrus Reticulata Peel Oil, Tocopherol, Citrus Aurantium
Bergamia Fruit Oil, Vanilla Planifolia Bean Extract, Linalool**, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Citral**, Geraniol**, Daucus Carota Sativa Root Extract*, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract*.*Organic **From natural essential oils.
